articles.title: Customer requests refund for prawn mee after almost finishing entire bowl - AsiaOne

articles.title: WhatsApp dials up search for Asia Pacific comms lead - Marketing Interactive
articles.description: The appointed individual will be based in Singapore and is also expected to execute PR programmes from proactive pitches highlighting positive uses of the product to feature launches and partnership.
articles.content: WhatsApp is on the search for a head of communications in Asia Pacific to oversee its long-term communications strategy as well as develop and maintain relationships with media and opinion leaders. T… [+2824 chars]

articles.title: Glass half full? Jay Chou wants Guinness world record for fan loyalty - AsiaOne
